website_summaries.verdict: Perhaps not the most practical, but if your toddler isn't as enthusiastic about potty training as you are, these lovable characters might win them over.
pros: The colorful prints of popular cartoon characters are highly appealing to little ones
Well-padded seat is soft and comfortable
Handles on either side offer a sense of security
Comes in a wide variety of Nickelodeon and Disney themes
cons: The padding isn't removable and cleaning in the crevices can be a challenge

customer_reviews.title: STOP! It's a pee trap!
customer_reviews.text: After having this seat for a month I can safely say that it is the worst seat! Urine gets trapped between the padding and the base. I had to clean it every time she used it because otherwise it would smell. So gross. Spend the extra cash and get a seat that is all one piece.
customer_reviews.author: ReneeV

customer_reviews.title: Messy seat!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this for my grandson. One for my house and one for his house. He loves the way it looks. That is where the positive ends. When he uses it, urine gets on the back of his legs. The seat we had before this you just needed to clean the little cup that directs the urine down. With this seat, the urine gets all over it. They need to do something about the design. My daughter is having the same problem at her house. Not my grandson doesn't want to give it up but it is making an incredible mess each time. I would discourage anyone from buying this. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Zyniker

customer_reviews.title: Handles are different from the picture
customer_reviews.text: The handles were different from the picture on Amazon. The different handles would only be a problem if a potty seat hook was purchased because it wouldn't hold the seat up due to the seat not having handles with holes. I'm still not sure how to store the potty seat when it's not in use because of this problem. My 2.5 year old daughter, who loves Paw Patrol, recites the names of all the characters. It's helped to make potty training a little easier... The seat fits our oval shaped toilet and other than the handles not being as pictured, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Pee everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason it gets two stars is because my kid loves Paw Patrol. Other than that it sucks. The splash guard is useless and we ended up just tossing it. My kid would always sit on it and then pee goes everywhere. The potty ring is two separate pieces and pee always gets trapped between the two pieces. When my toddler hangs it on the hook pee drips out onto the floor. We clean it constantly and are still having to clean pee off of the floor, toilet, and potty ring after every use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and exactly what we were looking for! I was a little confused on how to attach the rubber splash guard and there weren't any instructions but I looked it up and it was incredibly easy. For the record, the cushion pops off and that's how you attach the splash guard. Our Little loves paw patrol so it's encouraging him and an incentive at the same time. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Nattie Berry

customer_reviews.title: No hook included!
customer_reviews.text: The seat is ok so far. The main reason I gave it 3 instead of 5 stars is due to the fact that it doesn't come with a hook to hang it off the toilet. I saw the exact same pattern potty seat at Target today for cheaper and it included the hook, almost every seat available in stores comes with a hook. I wish I would have realized this before I bought it but I just assumed it would come with one.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S

customer_reviews.title: Good for Potty Training
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my two year old, who doesn’t like sitting on toddler potty chairs. Potty training has been much easier now that he is able to sit on the toilet like a “big boy.” I received a different design than ordered, but it wasn’t a big deal as my toddler likes the characters on the one we received. Pros: -Toddler is able to sit in the potty without falling in. -Cushioned seat is comfortable and easy to clean (we use Lysol wipes). Cons: -No splash guard. As a first time mom, I didn’t realize how messy potty training a boy could be. A splash guard would be helpful while he is learning to aim.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: This thing is gross. Continue your search.
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed with this. We have been using this consistently for less than 1 week now to transition my son from his little training potty to the big potty. He always makes sure to tuck himself behind the pew guard but the seat is somehow covered in pee ALL the time. It somehow gets between the seat and pee guard at the front. When I turn it over to clean underneath the pew is pooled in the plastic sections on the underside. It is a total mess and disgusting. We will be throwing it away once a new seat arrives.
customer_reviews.author: TorryGee

customer_reviews.title: Padded and cute, but does move on elongated toilets
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves Minnie Mouse so this encouraged her to be interested in the toilet. It's padded which is great for the little one if they're sitting for extended periods of time. We have an elongated toilet however, so this one will slide if you don't put your child on it yourself. I tried letting my daughter get on it (using her step stool for height) and it just slid up the seat. It wasn't a deal-breaker for me, as I don't mind helping her since I have to wipe her anyway. I don't use this for travel; I purchased a foldable seat that actually covers more area of the elongated toilet and doesn't move, but it isn't padded.
customer_reviews.author: duchovny0901

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning seam between padding and plastic is impossible.
customer_reviews.text: This seat functions fine and it seems durable enough. However, the problem is cleaning it. The seam between the padded seat and the plastic ring is a breeding ground for nastiness. Toddlers, who are presumably the ones using this seat, aren’t the most hygienic. My 2 year old tends to slide off the seat before wiping, usually to ask for some help. This sliding causes urine and sometimes poop to make it’s way into that crease, which is then impossible to clean. I tried using a toothpick wrapped in disinfecting wipes to get in between, but was never to get everything. For that reason, I wouldn’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: bexallday

customer_reviews.title: Good for training
customer_reviews.text: I bought this potty seat to help train my toddler. She loved the design, and that it was cushioned. The handles make it easy for her to grab on and pull herself up on the potty. The only thing that I don't love is that the seat itself does not seem to fit perfect on our toilet. We do NOT have an elongated toilet, so this should fit, however it does slide around a bit, and she's apprehensive to sit on it without help. I wish it fit a bit better. The plastic makes it easy to clean, and so far it has held up to being used daily.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Maniatis

customer_reviews.title: Great product with 1 gross flaw
customer_reviews.text: Excellent seat. It has really helped with potty training my little one. However, my wife and I failed to realize that the top and bottom Portions of the seat come apart. After a few days, urine gets in between the two parts and often gets on the floor. Very gross! The seat requires constant cleaning to ensure it doesn’t leak. I wish it was one complete seat. Otherwise it’s great for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Ksix

customer_reviews.title: NO URINE GUARD
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because according to photos, it came with an "easy to install" urine guard for boys. It. Does. Not. Come. With. A. Urine. Guard. It does not come with a urine guard. Amazon did right by me and refunded me, but I'm still having to spend MORE money on a different trainer seat. This seat does not work with male genetalia. Unless you're fortunate to be able to teach your male child to tuck it. Don't bother purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Reesa

customer_reviews.title: Helpful during transition to larger toilet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter while training to move to using the big potty. She loved that it was paw patrol and very excited when we first got it. This seat is lightweight and east to clean however it doesn’t fit quite right on the toilet seat. The seat seems to slip a bit when she tries to use it, and the handles can’t really be used when the child is sitting on it to learn to bear down. We have used it when traveling on vacation thought due to it being lightweight and small.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun look fir the kids just a little hard to clean in some areas
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun seat for potty train that my twins love with the characters on it. The handles help for the to hold while sitting or to carry. With the Hard plastic surround The cushion it’s hard to clean and mess that gets in there. Not east to separate which would be a big help to keep sanitary. Don’t want to keep buying more and more because I can’t clean it. It is a soft pad that help make it easy for them to stay on when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cantrech23

customer_reviews.title: Great little potty training seat for boys
customer_reviews.text: This arrived today (I ordered yesterday afternoon!!) It's perfect for the little guy I watch 2 times a week, mostly at his house, but sometimes at mine. We've been struggling with the potty training. The seat was here when we arrived at my house for lunch and nap. TWO successes....one after lunch and one after nap. The pee guard is a wonderful bonus!!! At his house it shoots out and over onto the floor. I realize it's only the first day using this seat, but it's super cute and little guy and I are both happy. 😊👍
customer_reviews.author: DE

customer_reviews.title: Came without the gray deflector for buys as shown in the photos
customer_reviews.text: I looked a long time to find a potty seat with an adequate deflector for boys. Thought i had found the right one as this is pictured in the ad. The seat just came and NO deflector! Then I was asked if I wanted to re-order. . . same problem with the 2nd seat, NO DEFLECTOR!
customer_reviews.author: Katlady11

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to clean properly
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the seat beacuse it's Paw Patrol! He likes to have the handles to hold on to which is a plus. The urine guard is useful. However, this seat is awful from my point of view as the parent. It doesn't fit to the toilet well and so my son has to be very careful when sitting down, otherwise the seat moves and there is a gap. The biggest issue is how disgusting this seat is from a hygiene point of view. I have tried everything to clean it but the urine seeps inside and no amount of bleach will fix it. It makes the whole bathroom smell like a portable toilet used by a construction crew.
customer_reviews.author: Jo White

customer_reviews.title: Good one!
customer_reviews.text: Works great with round toilet seats. Although I couldn’t get my 3 year old actually seat on it she is afraid to seat on big toilet and ours a bit high for her height even with a stool to climb upon. I think it’s a balance thing and she needs a little more time. I decided to keep it anyway cause padding is really good and inner opening is not wide as the other ones I saw. Love that it’s made in America. Good quality plastic! It’s a but bulky to take it out with but overall good product
customer_reviews.author: Almusha

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay put on the potty
customer_reviews.text: We thought getting this paw patrol seat would help our son want to try to go and enjoy the process. He was very excited to sit on his paw patrol potty seat. Disaster struck the first time he tried to slide on, the seat sat so loosly on the toilet seat that it slid out from under him and he fell into the toilet. Took 2 months before we could get him to try again. Great concept, failed in creating a usable product
customer_reviews.author: Brady Delperdang

customer_reviews.title: Good Seat, No Toilet Hook
customer_reviews.text: Fits toilets great (some front to rear sliding on bigger toilets) and easy to move around the house. Solid pad which is easy to wipe clean. Small enough to travel with in the car if needed, but wouldn't be ideal for taking up precious suit case space on a flight. Works about the same as the ones similar to this. This one did not come with a toilet hook to hang it on the side toilet. Not a big deal, and can easily be fixed with a 3M hook, but similar seats include the hook for the same price/convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Save Gas, Buy Online

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: These seats are awesome. I have a little one that started potty training early so I encouraged it with many little rewards for her...we had another baby and she started regressing and having accidents....so we bought this seat for every bathroom in the house to refresh her interest. Problem solved. Hard plastic handles. Soft, squishy, memory foam-like WIPEABLE seat. Lightweight and easy for her to take on and off the potty.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Boone

customer_reviews.title: Soft to sit but makes a huge mess
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. My 2yo daughter is fully potty trained but you have to position her just right or the pee goes everywhere. Did not have that trouble with other seats. It is difficult to clean because the urine can go into the seam between the cushion and plastic. Not returning because that just seems gross but do not recommend without changes. Also we are using this on an oblong shaped toilet and it slides front and back.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Gottlieb

customer_reviews.title: Seat is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my little one to help with potty training on a regular sized potty. The ninja turtle design looks great however there is a piece that is a "shield" for the pee to make it in the toilet and pee gets underneath it and in between the seat cushion and the plastic. It ends up leaking pee out all over the place and for 18 bucks I expected something better. I've taken it apart many times to clean it and its such a hassle. Would not recommend this toilet seat.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Egan

customer_reviews.title: Sent wrong color. Also, our kid thinks its uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the red one, but they sent the pink one. I see many other reviewers said the same thing. My toddler doesn't care about the color, but it's not comfortable to sit on since it fits the toilet weird. There is like this big gap in the front. Didn't return bc it was pretty cheap and we used it despite the wrong color being sent but def won't order from this company again. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Britt S.

customer_reviews.title: I love the gray pee guard
customer_reviews.text: While my little one loves the Paw Patrol theme, the design of the seat is lacking. I love the gray pee guard, however, if he misses it in any way, the pee trickles underneath the soft, blue seat and in-between the seat and the red frame that holds it. I have had to take the seat apart multiple times to rinse it and then dry it. It's not hard, but just a PIA. Potty training is hard as it is - I wish the subpar design of this seat didn't make it even harder.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen A.

customer_reviews.title: Toddler stamp of approval
customer_reviews.text: It’s a perfect fit for standard toilets, easy to clean, and it’s two year old approved. I wish I had gotten it on video when my two year old first saw her new seat, it would’ve been all the review you’d ever need. She grabbed it, sat down on the floor and grinned, saying “Woooowww” before telling me who was on her fancy seat. I know it’s something simple, but it made her incredibly happy to have her favorite show on her little seat. If your little one likes Bubble Guppies then this is the potty seat for you
customer_reviews.author: MommyD

customer_reviews.title: OK but no haner
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this previously from another vendor and it came with a small plastic handle to use to hang it and keep it out of the way. These two did not. I have to balance them against the wall. Not ideal. My grandson likes the Paw Patrol pictures but I was disappointed. The items were poorly wrapped for shipping and “pouffed” out the box because it was too small fortunately nothing was broken.
customer_reviews.author: FourBoysMom

customer_reviews.title: Not very functional
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a seat insert that my 3yo could do by himself, but this is a poor design. It doesn’t fit tightly on the seat so it slides all around while he tried to sit on it. Also, when he peed, it somehow got under the seat cushion and into the plastic. It came with a pee guard for boys, but somehow he still peed into the seat. I found this out when I went to take it out of the toilet and pee started dripping. So we stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I thought the cute pattern would be a good idea. That’s all this seat has going for it. It didn’t fit “flush” on my toilet seat and it doesn’t “guide” a butt to sit on it at all which I realized was important after having this. If they sit too forward they will pee on the floor. And you want this to be “easy” for them, not a challenge. I ended up getting the bjorn seat and it’s amazing in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT ORDER WAREHOUSE DEAL FOR A BOY - MISSING PARTS TWICE
customer_reviews.text: Thought i could save a few bucks by ordering the open box/warehouse deal that promises the item is in perfect condition but has damaged packing . I am on return number THREE now because none of them with damaged packaging seem to be able to keep the splash guard with the item. IF you have a little girl though this may work well for you because she likely doesnt need the splash guard and you can save a few dollars!
customer_reviews.author: Wolfie

customer_reviews.title: It is - what it is
customer_reviews.text: So, the first few months he refused to use it. Mainly because, he would pick it up off the toilet and point to each character. He understood the concept of potty but just didn’t want to sit down on his pals faces! Looking back, I would probably recommend to myself to buy a solid white one or something. But, now he has the hang of it and doesn’t play with it so much but he definitely still points each one out before or after! Kids.. that’s all I can say!
customer_reviews.author: Pineiro Family

customer_reviews.title: Not for elongated toilets
customer_reviews.text: The item is cute and well made, and my 2 year old loves it. However, we have elongated toilets in our house and this item doesn't fit securely on them well. it slides back and forth, which makes my daughter a little nervous when sitting on it.
customer_reviews.author: Devoted Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great for potty training - classic design
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is potty training and part of the excitement is making it as fun as possible. We tried to get a few different styles of seats to keep it interesting for her. She is doing very well with it and this seat works perfectly. Any big fan of Paw Patrol should be more than excited to plant your cheeks down on it and help the pups answer nature's call.
customer_reviews.author: Reviews All Day Long

customer_reviews.title: Nice product work better but ad description should be adjusted regarding fit.
customer_reviews.text: Gave 3 stars b/c it doesn't fit oval toilet good at all & ad says it fits all toilets. I have to lift him up in place, instead of him using the stool to get up there since fit is not good. It also needs to be slight bigger...he's a big boy but he hits the front sitting on it. (Have to watch when he does start to go so it don't go over he front on the floor) Probably works better for a regular round toilet but not for oval like mine. Quality is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Jackson

customer_reviews.title: I love how this seat can be taken apart and cleaned ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how this seat can be taken apart and cleaned really well. My son really likes having the handles and the splash guard has been great! This does not come with the hanger, as some others do I have seen both in stores and online - and it is not a big deal! We ended up buying one with a hanger and my son nearly ripped the toilet lid off trying to get the seat off the hanger, so I have found it's not really necessary. Would probably be fine using a command strip stuck to the side of the toilet tank.
customer_reviews.author: Maree

customer_reviews.title: Cute but hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: left on a seat at home its not too bad. But if you have boys the pee gets trapped in the little plastic gaps and on the bottom side of the seat. I have stuck my hand I pee so many times trying to get it moved or fixed for one of my boys to sit on. Its not very small either so I definitely don't have a bag big enough for it to travel in.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable Can’t find it cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable but as we all know potty training is a nightmare. LOL I would recommend this product easy to store because we all know we have toys all over our house and we need more space for toys LOL but I will say you can and will find it cheaper for about six $6-$10 at your local Walmart or if you’re military your Base exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Arizonasunshine

customer_reviews.title: Only fits a round toilet.
customer_reviews.text: I like this well enough, but it will not fit an oval toilet, only a small round one. So, it only fits one of the toilets in our house (in the master bath - not that useful). We tried on an oval one and it immediately slid out from under my 3 year old when he tried to sit on it. He was terrified to sit on it again for months, even though he loves Paw Patrol. So...not our favorite.
customer_reviews.author: rachindc

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this potty, she insists upon using this one instead of her "mini toilet" trainer she used one time. It's comfy, it's cute, lightweight, easy to clean, what more could you want? Also get the $2 hook thing that goes on the back of the toilet so you can hang this seat off of it. It makes life much easier, especially with a dancing toddler..
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAllTheThings

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for boys potty training!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg!! Game changer... I had no idea how much a pee shield was needed for boys. I had the little toilet to sit and it was so much mess to clean and boys are different to potty train, so I came across this seat and has change the routine. My son loves it and I don’t have to clean so much since it’s a lot easier to clean and flush.
customer_reviews.author: Amparo

customer_reviews.title: Does it's Job
customer_reviews.text: This is so portable and easy to use compared to an actual potty training toilet that you would have to lug around. My only reason for "4" stars is that its not the best accessibility to clean. My child is obviously learning and had a big #2 accident and it got smashed in between the plastic red and the cushion. It's really hard to clean those small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Slides around too much for my kids to use it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help my kids with toilet training. My kids end up not using this much because they are afraid to get on it because it slides around. It needs to stay on the toilet seat better without it sliding around, it makes them feel like they will fall. Another thing is that the urine does go under the pee splash guard a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Chau T.

customer_reviews.title: Great little seat
customer_reviews.text: My kids is already potty trained. We use this because she's so small that she always had to use her hands and arms when using the bathroom and when your kid has an upset tummy and needs to sit for a while you want her to be as comfy as possible. It works great! Arrived crazy fast (surprised considering the COVID delays). Packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Brock

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This potty seat is cute but i really dont recommend it for potty training. It slides all over the seat and isnt secure at all and makes my son nervous. Because it is not secure and slides around, it also means my son cant climb onto the potty by himself without help. Also, pee seems to get in between the cushion and the plastic which is gross and impossible to clean. I really want to return this because it was also missing pieces upon arrive and over all not a good product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: For Grandma's house
customer_reviews.text: This little potty seat is what "Grandma" has on hand. IT does move a little on the regular toilet, but it provides a sense of security that a toddler needs to not feel like they might fall in! I can imagine it would be good if you were taking a potty trainee on a road trip too. Good value for a positive experience.
customer_reviews.author: Tess Boden

customer_reviews.title: Pee leaks everywhere! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the Bubble Guppies design but it’s a very poorly designed seat and I will be returning it. When he pees, urine leaks everywhere- onto the toilet seat, under the cushion, in the splash guard - and when you remove the potty seat from the toilet pee drips everywhere. I’d literally have to disassemble and wash all the parts, as well as the toilet seat and floor, after every single use in order to not have pee everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for picky potty trainers
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. After a horrible go at potty training, we figured out she was sensitive to the hard plastic of most potty seats. We gave this a try and it made all the difference. It fits any toliet, so it was nice to take to take to family functions discretley too. Just be sure to pop up that foam pad daily or every other day at least. Urine will get under there, but a bleach wipe makes it easy to wipe up.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Spookynine

customer_reviews.title: Leaves marks and not comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a plastic white white that didn't have cushion. This paw patrol one is as bad or worse. It leaves bad marks on his legs/cheeks area after sitting only a couple minutes. He was crying to get off because it hurt. The red ring on the inside is the problem. Also, it doesn't fit oval toilet and is impossible to get him on without it moving to the point of falling off. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Nice seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this potty seat for my almost 3 year old in hopes it would encourage him to start using the potty. We have a stand alone potty that he doesn't seem to like, so when I saw this one I thought it was worth a shot. The seat is soft and so far has been easy to clean. It has been a slow process but I think the big boy seat is helping. I saw a lot of bad reviews so I was hesitant about my purchase, but we have no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is great for potty training my paw patrol loving toddler. Pro tip: You can remove the top cushion portion to clean underneath. I didn't know this and threw out a completely fine potty seat because it stunk and I didn't know I could remove the cushion to clean under it until after I purchased this one and it came with instruction to remove the cushion in order to install the "cup".
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: These have fit every toilet we've used them on! Ours are oblong and the grandparents' is round. If you want your kids to be excited about potty training and sitting on the big potty, find their favorite character! The first week we got it, they suddenly had to go potty every 30 minutes they were so excited. If staying at the grandparents house this goes with us and we never have accidents!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: This seat convinced our son to use the potty!
customer_reviews.text: My son wasn’t willing to try going potty on the potty chair, so we have this potty seat a try and it worked. He loves that it’s Paw Patrol and it’s a “big boy seat”. Only downside is he can pull out the guard that prevents pee from getting on the floor and oftentimes pee also gets between the cushion and the bottom of the seat, so pee leaks out. Not a huge deal, we just make sure to rinse ours in between trips to the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay R

customer_reviews.title: MISSING A PIECE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my grandson and found that it didn't come with the pee guard. My daughter just told me about it and I just found out. I wanted this for two main reasons. One my grandson loves Paw Patrol and reason two is because he is a boy and it was supposed to come with the pee guard.
customer_reviews.author: CharleneR

customer_reviews.title: Useless--slides all over
customer_reviews.text: This toilet seat has nothing on it to stop it from sliding. It slides 4 inches in each direction, back, forth, and side to side. Ridiculous. Tried sitting my toddler on it to see if it would work anyway, and now he's terrified of the toilet--great start to potty training. Also, it is definitely not for long toilet seats even though it specifies that it is.
customer_reviews.author: EJC

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality potty seat!
customer_reviews.text: My three year old is obsessed with paw patrol and we bought this potty seat to replace the previous one and she absolutely fell in love with it ( ya kids fall in love with strange things ) it’s her favorite potty seat! It’s very well cushioned and the side handles are great help with toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: Works great for boys
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product for potty training. Especially if you have a boy because of the pee shield. It works amazing. I saw a review before I bought and saw that it was hard to clean but it isn't. Yes you child is going to pee on it, yes you have to clean it, but it's super simple. We keep it hanging on the side of our toilet and my son puts it on himself (he's 2) so it's easy.
customer_reviews.author: hank

customer_reviews.title: The only thing nice about this seat is that it's paw patrol
customer_reviews.text: The only thing nice about this seat is that it's paw patrol. It's actually the worst seat ever. It's like my toddler is on a surfboard, when he gets on it. It doesn't stay put, he slides off it and by the time he's done, the seat is pushed to the back of the toilet and he's trying not to fall in. Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Tyra T. Henry

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy! My son liked it so much and was encouraged to go to the potty. The seat is soft and padded and made it comfortable during the training session. The only wish I had is that it could be latched to the toilet seat to make it more sturdy, but otherwise good!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa F

customer_reviews.title: Not secure, not good for boys
customer_reviews.text: This did not sit securely on our toilet so my son was afraid of it. It also did not position his legs in such a way that the pee would actually go into the toilet so it was a mess all around. I'd imagine the spongy seat would have stunk after not much use had we kept using this for more than a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Harmonica

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt buy again
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's cute - but if you're buying it simply for the character (like me), there are others out there. As many mentioned, the splash guard is pointless. After reading many reviews before purchasing, I didn't have high expectations in regards to that. I was mainly looking for something that wouldn't leave a red ring afterwards and unfortunately it did. As many of us know, potty training entails a lot of sitting and waiting. The child needs to be comfortable (mentally and physically) or else it's just going to make the process harder. My son loved it at first, but now is back to the potty chair because he says it hurts. So now I'm back to square one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Splash Guard Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a potty seat? This one is well constructed, has images of Paw Patrol characters to encourage friendliness during a new process/procedure, has a splash guard for little boys that's come in handy more than once, and seems to be well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: TheTrainer

customer_reviews.title: More than you need to know
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd seat. We have been potty trained for 1 year. Yes....these things get gross quick. The cushion comes off, but what you can never get clean is the porous plastic that is where all the stray pee sets. They work great for those little pee pee's so they don't spray out when they sit. Hope this helps some lost soul!
customer_reviews.author: Shaylen

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: We’ve just started the process of Potty Training g our 2 yr old son, the one thing that I’m certain of. Is that he’s stoked on wanting to try cause of the Winnie the Pooh characters on it. Lol I’ve had no problems with it. It’s easy to clean it’s convenient no hassle whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: bryan fonseca

customer_reviews.title: TOO small.
customer_reviews.text: TINY!!! I anticipated a potty seat being smaller than the toilet seat, after all, that's the point - but the opening in the center is the size of a softball at best... this was just messes and accidents waiting to happen. Also, ours did not come with the pee guard. That wasn't the deal breaker, though - it was just incredibly tiny!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Boots

customer_reviews.title: Wobbles and does not fit
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit on all toilets and wobbles around really easily making it hard for child to sit comfortably. Unfortunately this means we can only use it in one bathroom, and has set us back in the potty training world. She gets scared when it shifts when sitting. Need something that is steady and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Krystyn Strouse

customer_reviews.title: Cute but hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: There are things about this seat that are great. My son loves it and I like the little guard on the front and that you can just set it on and off the toilet . The problem I have with it is that it is not all one thing so the pad comes off the hard plastic. The area between the two pieces often gets pee in it so unless I take the whole thing apart and clean it after each use it starts to smell bad very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good for helping potty training
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Minnie mouse, she loves to be able to use the big potty. Only downside is that this doesn't fit exactly on the toilet.. it has a little back and forth movement that can leave a inch gap in the front, so i do have to hold it when she needs to go. I believe it just depends on the toilet design, my father in laws fits perfect on his for when he's watching her.
customer_reviews.author: J neff

customer_reviews.title: No more potties at my house
customer_reviews.text: My three year old loves this seat because of course it's paw patrol. I love it because it's soft, easy to put on the toilet and take off because there are no straps or anything you just rest it on the toilet and take it off. It's sturdy, easy to clean and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hackett

customer_reviews.title: Awful to clean
customer_reviews.text: This works fine but after using it I wish I had gotten a potty seat that was all one piece. I have a boy and the urine gets in between the seat/pad all the time and smells of you don't clean it daily. You have to take it all apart. Well use this for a while so I wish I had gotten a different design without urine traps.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney M.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old LOVES his Mickey potty seat. Its great for potty training and very easy to clean. It's very easy to travel with it also, we took it to our camp when we went. He loves it. It makes him look forward to using it!. Definitely recommend!.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Slides to much!
customer_reviews.text: Okay so my issue is that it doesn’t sot too well on the average toilet. 1st time sitting my son pinched his finger because it slides off. Once he sat with someone holding the seat It was okay. It was so much easier for him to sot on a normal toilet seat.
customer_reviews.author: William A.

customer_reviews.title: Red scratched on both leg after use
customer_reviews.text: I like the adorable design of the seat. The seat is perfect design for the kids when sit on it. And my kids like the soft top. However, the hard plastic bottom is sharp that scratching the leg, there are red scratched on both leg after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Huang

customer_reviews.title: excited kid flys off seat. Pee and poo everywhere
customer_reviews.text: My son was so exited to use this seat. Unfortunately it didn’t conform and stay put on our toilet and my child and the seat flew off the toilet onto the floor. there was poop and pee everywhere. The horror. And now he’s terrified to try another seat.. I am so sick of wiping poop out of the floor potty and I was so looking forward to no more of that. C’est la vie.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great seat for my 3yr
customer_reviews.text: Transitioning from a small plastic toilet to this (on the adult toilet). Easy to use, fits my toilet as advertised. My only downfall is the spray guard for boys sometimes falls off, and sometimes my little one shoots over it. Other than that, good value
customer_reviews.author: BoDEAN

customer_reviews.title: our granddaughter has and she seems to enjoy it. It fits on an elongated toilet seat ...
customer_reviews.text: While I have not used it, our granddaughter has and she seems to enjoy it. It fits on an elongated toilet seat with no problem. No shifting and is stable while she gets on by her self. Padding is very adequate and it is easy to clean. I put a 3M hook on wall so it is easy for her to grab and put in place when needed.
customer_reviews.author: T. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Great potty seat!
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately, I found the same one that my grandson has at home. It makes visits and potting at Grandma’s much smoother. He loves Paw Patrol and this seat works very well on the real toilet (with a small stool for him to climb up to the toilet).
customer_reviews.author: J Jones

customer_reviews.title: Make potty time fun!
customer_reviews.text: Our little girl was so excited to use the potty with the whole gang on her potty seat. Comes apart easy for cleaning. Fits almost any toilet. Super cute Paw Patrol art to make potty time fun. Probably sturdy enough to use for a kid or two without falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jared S. Bates

customer_reviews.title: Too wobbly and scary for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Here's the thing, it's too small for most toilets, and therefore wobbles. My 3 yr old daughter is scare to death of sitting on this thing. She is scared of falling in and getting flushed down. While I'm reasonably sure the last 2 parts will not happen and endeavor to explain this at a level a 3 yr old can get, the wobbling scares the sh*t out of her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What you'd expect from a toilet seat
customer_reviews.text: Please remember that this is for children and not drunk adults. You will pee on the stupid paw patrol dogs if you try to use this training seat. Seat works as expected. However, my kid is still not potty trained and it's been a year.
customer_reviews.author: **Kat**

customer_reviews.title: Potty training boys is easier than potty training girls. 😯
customer_reviews.text: My boy is happy to be using the potty! Every chance he gets, he'll take it out and place it on, comes to me YELLING that he has to go potty, and just sits there after I place him on singing ABC's and not doing anything else. In due time he'll actually use it. I'm just glad he's not afraid of it. Adorable lil bear! 🐻 Non-sticky after sitting on it for a few minutes because he doesn't want to get off. Easy to clean up, too. Design is awesome and I love it. Can I have one in adult size, please? 😏
customer_reviews.author: Kuba

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but messy
customer_reviews.text: Love that the cup is higher than other potties which helps keep the pee in the potty. My complaint is that pee somehow gets between the cushion and the seat which then leaves a mess. If it was all one piece, I think that would solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: snwilliams80

customer_reviews.title: Big girl style
customer_reviews.text: She likes it better then her little potty that she has, and makes it apt easier for her to get use to using the potty when she goes back to school. But for now she’s run to it and tell me I’m taking far too long because she wants to sit on the potty
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my 3 year old.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one when we started potty training and now we have three! One for each bathroom. Its super light and small enough to pop into a shoulder bag when travelling. So no excuses for putting pull ups on my toddler now. With all the cute relatable character options, my 2.5 year old loves sitting on them. I highly recommend this to anyone potty training their child. Oh and cant beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: Great potty seat
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought a few of these potty seats over the past few years. They are perfect for kids, cushioned and comfortable and just the right size, and have cute patterns. They seem to last about a year or so before the plastic on the seat starts cracking and it needs to be replaced. Overall a great potty seat!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is almost 3 and we are pushing party training harder now. All the characters make it more inviting. Just wish it was a little bit bigger so it fit on the toilet seat itself. When The baby gets up there she tends to slide And the baby seat shifts due to not being snug fit on the Toilet seat. I can see it’s a good product, and came very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Used for 6+ months, looking for a new seat
customer_reviews.text: We used this toddler seat for our son for over 6 months. It started out okay, he loves the characters and how well the seat is cushioned. However, over time the gap between the cushion and the plastic gets hard to clean, the gray pee shield keeps moving around, and after he sits on the seat for more than 10mins (for number two) it leaves a deep red mark on his bottom and he complains about how it hurts. We’ll be purchasing another one to replace this seat as it is no longer working for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but unstable
customer_reviews.text: My little granddaughter loves her princess pottt seat. Very pretty. However, it slides around on the toilet seat as she's trying to get on it. She wants me to hold it still until she gets seated. I wish it was more stable for her.
customer_reviews.author: singerjewel

customer_reviews.title: No hook to hang on toilet when not in use!
customer_reviews.text: It functions fine as a potty seat, but the Paw Patrol one did not come with the plastic hook that allows you to hang it on the side of the toilet when not in use. Oddly it has the slit, so I assumed the hook was missing and I went through the hassle of returning/having a replacement shipped. That one is missing it as well. You can get a Paw Patrol seat at Target for the same price and it comes with the hook.
customer_reviews.author: sb16

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have twin boys and they are almost 3 now. We are potty training them right now and they just love these Paw Patrol potty seats. I especially think the pee guard is an excellent idea because they really work! The boys like to sit on them without the fear of falling through the regular toilet seat. The fact that they are huge fans of Paw Patrol really helped too.
customer_reviews.author: GY

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my 3 year old granddaughter and she love it. Makes her feel like a big girl to sit on the toilet like everyone else. The fact that it’s Minnie sealed the deal for her. It’s really well made.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Gross urine smell!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to use while potty training and it was great in the beginning. Its been a couple of months and I noticed that it was smelling like urine in the bathroom. Cleaned bathroom like a mad woman but it still smelled. I realized it was the potty seat. Pee was getting caught between the hard plastic and the cushion. It doesn't matter how many times separate the two and clean the cushion with bleach, the urine smell is still so strong. I'm going to look into a potty seat that is one piece. I gave it two starts because my son did like the characters but the functionality sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its ok but design flaw
customer_reviews.text: It sureves it's purpose, but the way that it's designed, it allows boys urin to hit the sheild, then go under the seat, between the cushon and plastic. if you dont disasenble and clean this every time, it will stink horribly.
customer_reviews.author: AntNewYork

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter won't use anything else!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter prefers using her Dora seat over her own all-in-one potty chair. It is bright and colorful and the cushion is soft enough for her and fits well on my toilet. The only reason I did not give this product a 5 star rating is because I feel the front end is a little too narrow and needs to be rounded a bit more. If she is not positioned absolutely exactly right her pee sometimes goes over the front of the seat instead of into the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: More for round toilets not so much oblong ones! Still ok tho
customer_reviews.text: My son is very attracted to the looks of the seat. Seems to be durable enough. However, my toilet is more oblong than round so it's a loose fit with about 3/4 inch of play to move around. After a couple self improvements it works fine lol
customer_reviews.author: Ryan white

customer_reviews.title: Pinches the butt
customer_reviews.text: I've used this types of potty seats before but this one, for some reason, pinches their little butts. Doesn't seem like there is enough padding so when they sit it gets all pushed down to the plastic and when they get up there a ring on their leg and not a light one, kinda deep. I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy44

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It does the job of making it comfortable for my toddler to use the potty. But pee does get stuck between the of and plastic casing so you have to wash/rinse it after each use. Does not come with the potty hook! Thankfully I saved the old one I had from a previous potty seat.
customer_reviews.author: Gemerial

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: Originally liked the characters when starting training, HOWEVER it is hard to clean as urine gets stuck between padding and plastic despite rinsing and cleaning each use. Save your money and get a one piece all plastic design, this is not worth the smell!
customer_reviews.author: petes2

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Don’t understand the negative reviews. Got this for my 2 year old granddaughter as she loves Bubble Guppies. Fit perfectly on the toilet seat and had no mess. One user commented on having to clean the seat after each use.... wouldn’t you do that anyway?? I use a sanitizing wipe each time regardless. So far so good, and the best thing is the size in case you need to travel. It also comes with a splash protector for boys. Just be sure the child is sitting properly on the seat and you’ll have no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but worthless
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have read the reviews before buying, but my kid loves Paw Patrol and I thought these would help motivate her to potty train. Unfortunately, these have no kind of grip or fasteners on the bottom so they slide all over the toilet seat, which isn’t really conducive to trying to get a toddler to go to the potty independently, since you have to hold it down as they are getting on and off of it. Also, due to the flat design, pee sometimes sprays up and ends up on my kid’s legs and all over the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

product_meta.title: Nickelodeon Paw Patrol"Calling All Pups" Soft Potty Seat
product_meta.description: Color:Paw Patrol - Calling All PupsThere's no job too big, or pup too small to help make potty training fun. This Nickelodeon Paw Patrol soft potty seat features a durable construction made in the USA & your favorite Paw Patrol pups to the rescue. Easy grip side handles provide extra stability for your child. Removable cushion allows for easy cleaning. Each seat fits securely on both regular & elongated toilet seats.
feature_bullets: EASY-GRIP HANDLES: Provide extra security & stability for your child which help build confidence while potty training
FITS MOST TOILETS: Fits securely on most regular & elongated seats.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars6,058 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
